channel.title: Blog on Reboot my Life!
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Reboot my Life!

item.title: A "short" update about blogs and elephants
item.description: tl;dr I updated my website – We’re in Africa! – No elephant pictures in this post (sorry) As you may notice, I didn’t update my blog for a long period. Mostly for two reason. First, I was busy studying in Leipzig. If you like, you can read a really short recap in my about section on my portfolio page. The second reason was, that I wanted to update my whole website.
